page.title: 19Village changes Shaugh Prior
page.content: Before our school was built,the old Post Office was the school.Two old houses opposite the old Post Office used to be the village Pub.The village once had a Blacksmith whose cottage still stands today.Many of the old farms have barns which have been modernised and made into houses,there are several farms in our area.The old Post Office is now a nice little cottage, and we now have a Post Office and Shop at the bottom of the village. Recently our school was given a swimming pool, when nearby Lee Moor School closed down,it is well used by us all.
